meanings.definition: To synchronize data after an event or action has occurred.
meanings.sent1: After the meeting, they will postsync their notes to ensure everyone has the latest information.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to postsync your files before leaving the office to avoid any discrepancies.
meanings.sent3: The team decided to postsync their schedules by doing a group dance every morning.
meanings.sent4: She postsynced her thoughts with her emotions, creating a harmonious balance.
meanings.sent5: Postsyncing your devices is like making sure all the puzzle pieces fit perfectly together.

meanings.definition: A synchronization process that occurs after an event or action.
meanings.sent1: The postsync of the data was completed seamlessly, ensuring no information was lost.
meanings.sent2: During the postsync, the system automatically updates all relevant files.
meanings.sent3: The postsync party was a fun way to celebrate the successful completion of the project.
meanings.sent4: The postsync acted like a guardian angel, protecting the data from any errors.
meanings.sent5: The postsync was like a magical spell that brought order to the chaos of information.
